price: (56) Is [because] We hasten for them good things? Rather, they do not perceive.[961]
arabic: نُسَارِعُ لَهُمۡ فِي ٱلۡخَيۡرَٰتِۚ بَل لَّا يَشۡعُرُونَ
footnotes: [961]- That the good things given to them in this world are but a trial for them.

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: nusāriʿu lahum fī al-khayrāti bal lā yashʿurūna
